alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Campbell; Claiborne; Grainger; Knox; Morgan; Scott; Union (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 8:17PM CDT until June 11 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Morgan County in east Tennessee... Claiborne County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Knox County in east Tennessee... Northern Anderson County in east Tennessee... Campbell County in east Tennessee... Western Grainger County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Scott County in east Tennessee... Union County in east Tennessee... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 916 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles west of Jacksboro, or 14 miles west of La Follette, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clinton, La Follette, Maynardville, New Tazewell, Tazewell, Plainview, Jacksboro, Harrogate, Jellico and Caryville. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 118 and 161. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Campbell; Claiborne; Grainger; Knox; Morgan; Scott; Union
